Posts.Content: Apr 13, 2008 09:13AM October wrote: Hi Trudie, You will find lots of answers on the Breast Reconstruction topic (the next one down from this topic). Will you be having bilateral or unilateral? Surgery times are different of course, and will recon be immediate? I had delayed bilateral recon. Many have shared their experiences on the Reconstruction site. Good luck with everything, you will find lots of support here. Best Regards, Sara
